ComparePlaybooks.title: ComparePlaybooks
ComparePlaybooks.summary: Compares configurations between two versions of a published playbook.

DeleteComponentAsset.title: DeleteComponentAsset
DeleteComponentAsset.summary: Deletes the assets in a component.

DescribeComponentAssetForm.title: DescribeComponentAssetForm
DescribeComponentAssetForm.summary: Queries the metadata of assets in a component. The metadata of an asset refers to the fields that describe the asset.

DescribeComponentAssets.title: DescribeComponentAssets
DescribeComponentAssets.summary: Queries a list of assets in a component.

DescribeComponentList.title: DescribeComponentList
DescribeComponentList.summary: Queries a list of common components that are available.

DescribeComponentPlaybook.title: DescribeComponentPlaybook
DescribeComponentPlaybook.summary: Queries a list of predefined components that are available.

DescribeComponentsJs.title: DescribeComponentsJs
DescribeComponentsJs.summary: Queries the JavaScript file of a component. The component uses the returned JavaScript file for page rendering.

DescribeDistinctReleases.title: DescribeDistinctReleases
DescribeDistinctReleases.summary: Queries the information about the published versions of a playbook after deduplication.

DescribeEnumItems.title: DescribeEnumItems
DescribeEnumItems.summary: Queries enumeration items that are required by a cloud service.

DescribeExecutePlaybooks.title: DescribeExecutePlaybooks
DescribeExecutePlaybooks.summary: Queries the playbooks that are available for an automatic response plan.

DescribeField.title: DescribeField
DescribeField.summary: Queries the global configuration information about a cloud service.

DescribeGroupProductions.title: DescribeGroupProductions
DescribeGroupProductions.summary: Queries groups of Alibaba Cloud services.

DescribeLatestRecordSchema.title: DescribeLatestRecordSchema
DescribeLatestRecordSchema.summary: Queries the output structure information of each node in a playbook based on the most recent running record of the playbook.

DescribeNodeParamTags.title: DescribeNodeParamTags
DescribeNodeParamTags.summary: Queries recommended dynamic input parameters of a component for playbook orchestration.

DescribeOpenApiInfo.title: DescribeOpenApiInfo
DescribeOpenApiInfo.summary: Queries the details of an API operation.

DescribeOpenApiList.title: DescribeOpenApiList
DescribeOpenApiList.summary: Queries the API operations of an Alibaba Cloud service.

DescribePlaybook.title: DescribePlaybook
DescribePlaybook.summary: Queries the XML configuration of a playbook.

DescribePlaybookInputOutput.title: DescribePlaybookInputOutput
DescribePlaybookInputOutput.summary: Queries the input and output parameter configurations of a playbook.

DescribePlaybookMetrics.title: DescribePlaybookMetrics
DescribePlaybookMetrics.summary: Queries the metrics of a playbook. The metrics include the playbook name, playbook description, the number of times that the playbook is run, and the failure rate of the playbook.

DescribePlaybookNodesOutput.title: DescribePlaybookNodesOutput
DescribePlaybookNodesOutput.summary: Queries the historical output data of a component node.

DescribePlaybookNumberMetrics.title: DescribePlaybookNumberMetrics
DescribePlaybookNumberMetrics.summary: Queries the statistics of Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR), such as the numbers of created and enabled playbooks.

DescribePlaybookReleases.title: DescribePlaybookReleases
DescribePlaybookReleases.summary: Queries the information about the published versions of a playbook.

DescribePopApi.title: DescribePopApi
DescribePopApi.summary: Queries the details of an API operation.

DescribeProcessTaskCount.title: Query the Number of Associated Disposal Tasks by Entity UUID
DescribeProcessTaskCount.summary: Query the number of associated disposal tasks based on the entity UUID.

DescribeProcessTasks.title: DescribeProcessTasks
DescribeProcessTasks.summary: Queries the information about handling tasks. When you use Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR) to handle events, handling tasks are generated in the handling center.

DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList.title: DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList
DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList.summary: Queries the data that is returned when a component initiates an action in a playbook task.

DescribeSoarRecordInOutput.title: DescribeSoarRecordInOutput
DescribeSoarRecordInOutput.summary: Queries the input and output data of a component action. You can call this operation after a playbook is run.

DescribeSoarRecords.title: DescribeSoarRecords
DescribeSoarRecords.summary: Get the execution records of a playbook.

DescribeSoarTaskAndActions.title: DescribeSoarTaskAndActions
DescribeSoarTaskAndActions.summary: Queries the execution records of a component during the running of a playbook.

DescribeSophonCommands.title: DescribeSophonCommands
DescribeSophonCommands.summary: Queries the commands that can be run to obtain objects.

DescribeVendorApiList.title: DescribeVendorApiList
DescribeVendorApiList.summary: Queries the API operations of a cloud service provider.

DescriberPython3ScriptLogs.title: DescriberPython3ScriptLogs
DescriberPython3ScriptLogs.summary: Queries the operational logs of a Python3 script by using the UUID that is returned when the script is run. The UUID is specified by requestUuid.

ModifyComponentAsset.title: ModifyComponentAsset
ModifyComponentAsset.summary: Modifies the information about the asset that is configured for a component.

ModifyPlaybook.title: ModifyPlaybook
ModifyPlaybook.summary: Modifies the configuration of a playbook.

ModifyPlaybookInputOutput.title: ModifyPlaybookInputOutput
ModifyPlaybookInputOutput.summary: Modifies the input and output parameters of a playbook.

PublishPlaybook.title: PublishPlaybook
PublishPlaybook.summary: Publishes the playbook. After the playbook is published, the playbook runs based on the new logic.

QueryTreeData.title: QueryTreeData
QueryTreeData.summary: Queries all playbooks at a time.

RevertPlaybookRelease.title: RevertPlaybookRelease
RevertPlaybookRelease.summary: Rolls back a playbook to a specific version. You can determine whether to publish the new playbook version during the rollback.

RunNotifyComponentWithEmail.title: RunNotifyComponentWithEmail
RunNotifyComponentWithEmail.summary: Runs the email notification component to send messages.

RunNotifyComponentWithMessageCenter.title: Notification Component - Test Message Center Message Sending
RunNotifyComponentWithMessageCenter.summary: Execute Notification Component - Send Message via Message Center.

RunNotifyComponentWithWebhook.title: RunNotifyComponentWithWebhook
RunNotifyComponentWithWebhook.summary: Runs the webhook notification component to send messages.

RunPython3Script.title: RunPython3Script
RunPython3Script.summary: Submits and runs a Python3 script. You can call this operation only for data processing.

TriggerPlaybook.title: TriggerPlaybook
TriggerPlaybook.summary: Triggers an enabled custom playbook or a predefined playbook.

TriggerProcessTask.title: TriggerProcessTask
TriggerProcessTask.summary: Performs an action on a handling task that is generated by the handling center when an event is handled by using Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR). For example, you can call this operation to cancel blocking or isolation, or retry blocking.

TriggerSophonPlaybook.title: TriggerSophonPlaybook
TriggerSophonPlaybook.summary: Triggers a playbook or a command.

VerifyPlaybook.title: VerifyPlaybook
VerifyPlaybook.summary: Checks whether the configuration of the playbook is correct and whether the logic of the orchestration is reasonable.

VerifyPythonFile.title: VerifyPythonFile
VerifyPythonFile.summary: Checks whether the syntax of a Python code snippet is correct.
